    • getNamespace

      public String getNamespace()
      Description copied from class: Grammar
      What is this grammar's namespace ? This will help separate grammar rules with matching names from different grammars, which is of importance when composing grammars.
      Specified by:
      getNamespace in class Grammar

    • keyword

      public ParserCombinator keyword()
      Description copied from class: Grammar
      Matches a potential keyword. There is no need to actually test whether it is a keyword, as Koopa tries to do that automatically anyway.
      Overrides:
      keyword in class KoopaGrammar
